nodes.description: 2020年国会通过法案扩大紫心勋章适用范围至外国恐怖主义相关伤亡
nodes.support_text: Congress last year expanded eligibility for the Purple Heart to service members killed or wounded in an act inspired or motivated by a foreign terrorist organization

nodes.support_text: he plans to offer the proposal Wednesday as an amendment to the defense bill
